output.sentences: This happy couple decided to spend the day together at the Art Car fest.
There were items at the art car fest saying it was the 10th anniversary of the event.
There were some really unusual cars at the Art Car Fest.
The couple walked around after and noticed some flowers in the town and took pictures of each other.
The man stood in front of the apartment building for his picture to be taken.
